statements: DELETE FROM BiodiversityData WHERE id = 1 AND population_count > 1000
DELETE FROM BiodiversityData WHERE ecosystem = 'Tropical Rainforest'
DELETE FROM species WHERE ecosystem_id = (SELECT id FROM ecosystems WHERE name = 'Forest');
DELETE FROM species_population WHERE ecosystem_id = 2 AND species_id = 5;
DELETE FROM species_population WHERE species_id = 1 AND ecosystem_id = 2
DELETE FROM species WHERE scientific_name = 'Panthera leo'
DELETE FROM Observations WHERE observer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Observations WHERE species_id = 1 AND date_observed < '2021-01-01';
